name: The Association for Leprosy Education, Rehabilitation and Treatment - India
briefDescription: To provide both preventive and curative health services by conducting, managing, maintaining, equipping and administering hospitals, clinics, surveys or similar activities related to leprosy, TB and other diseases that afflict the communities. To educate, train and assist financially or otherwise in the education and training of teachers, social workers, staff, medical and non medical personnel for the purpose of activities and projects taken up by the Association. To establish, initiate and undertake studies or research and maintain data and statistics in relation to leprosy work, TB and other health related issues.
